title: Oil firms, govt are earning well. But you may still have to pay high fuel prices
selftext: Oil firms are earning 10 rupees per litre.Operating profit of Refiners to hit 1 lakh crore combined. Petrol still retails above 100 in multiple parts of the country. Yet the government won't drop taxes as there is no other revenue source for it. If they drop taxes the budget deficits will widen and it becomes apparent to everyone the much touted economy is not generating enough profits to pay higher taxes!
